data.value: The login for the subscription failed. Try signing in again to fix the issue.

data.value: Cloud Services are not available in this subscription.

data.name: MissingTools
data.value: The Microsoft Azure tools have not been properly installed. Click "OK" to download the tools, then restart Visual Studio to continue.
